OpCom.name: G01.01
OpCom.description: Does the company make an explicit, clearly articulated policy commitment to human rights, including to freedom of expression and information?

OpCom.name: G01.02
OpCom.description: Does the company make an explicit, clearly articulated policy commitment to human rights, including to privacy?

OpCom.name: G01.03
OpCom.description: Does the company disclose an explicit, clearly articulated policy commitment to human rights in its development and use of algorithmic systems?
